stories.title: Search for GitHub User
stories.description: As a user, I want to search for a GitHub user by entering their username so I can explore their profile and followers
acceptance_criteria: User can enter a username in the text field
User can tap 'Get Followers' button to search
User can press return key to submit search
App navigates to follower list screen on successful search

stories.title: Handle Empty Username Search
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a validation message when I try to search without entering a username so I know what to do
acceptance_criteria: Alert appears when 'Get Followers' is tapped with empty text field
Alert shows title 'Empty Username'
Alert shows message 'Please enter a username. We need to know who to look for ðŸ˜€.'
Alert has 'Ok' button to dismiss

stories.title: Dismiss Keyboard
stories.description: As a user, I want to dismiss the keyboard by tapping outside the text field for better user experience
acceptance_criteria: Keyboard dismisses when user taps outside text field
Text field loses focus
Keyboard animation is smooth

stories.title: Clear Text Field on Return
stories.description: As a user, I want the text field to be cleared when I return to the search screen so I can start fresh
acceptance_criteria: Text field is empty when returning to SearchVC
Previous search text is cleared
Text field is ready for new input

stories.title: View Followers in Grid
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a user's followers displayed in a grid layout so I can browse them visually
acceptance_criteria: Followers are displayed in a 3-column grid
Each follower shows avatar image and username
Grid layout adapts to different screen sizes

stories.title: Search Through Followers
stories.description: As a user, I want to search through the current followers by username so I can find specific people
acceptance_criteria: Search bar appears in navigation
Search filters followers in real-time
Search is case-insensitive
Empty search shows all followers

stories.title: Empty State for No Followers
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a helpful message when a user has no followers so I understand the situation
acceptance_criteria: Empty state view appears when no followers
Shows 'No Followers' message
Shows 'This user has no followers. Go follow them!' subtitle
Shows person.slash icon

stories.title: View User Profile Details
stories.description: As a user, I want to tap on a follower to see their detailed profile information so I can learn more about them
acceptance_criteria: Tapping follower cell opens UserInfoVC
UserInfoVC displays user's basic information
UserInfoVC has 'Done' button to dismiss

stories.title: Empty Favorites State
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a helpful message when I have no favorites yet so I know what to do
acceptance_criteria: Empty state view appears when no favorites
Shows 'No Favorites' message

stories.title: Handle Duplicate Favorites
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a message when trying to add a user who is already in favorites so I know they're already saved
acceptance_criteria: Alert appears when trying to add existing favorite
Alert shows 'You've already favorited this user. You must REALLY like them!' message
Alert has 'Ok' button to dismiss
